channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Los Angeles has declared a state of emergency as a wildfire has exploded from 10 acres to more than 2,900 acres in just hours. #Wildfire #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews
item.description: Los Angeles has declared a state of emergency as a wildfire has exploded from 10 acres to more than 2,900 acres in just hours. #Wildfire #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews

item.title: Los Angeles has declared a state of emergency after a wildfire exploded from 10 acres to more than 2,900 acres in a matter of hours. #LosAngeles #California #Wildfire #Fire #LosAngelesFire #Wildfires #US #BBCNews
item.description: Los Angeles has declared a state of emergency after a wildfire exploded from 10 acres to more than 2,900 acres in a matter of hours. #LosAngeles #California #Wildfire #Fire #LosAngelesFire #Wildfires #US #BBCNews

item.title: The fire broke out in Los Angeles at about 10:30 (18:30 GMT) on Tuesday and rapidly spread in incredibly dry conditions and high winds. #Wildfire #LA #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews
item.description: The fire broke out in Los Angeles at about 10:30 (18:30 GMT) on Tuesday and rapidly spread in incredibly dry conditions and high winds. #Wildfire #LA #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews

item.title: The weather phenomena known as the Santa Ana winds has caused the wildfire to spread so rapidly through LA. #Wildfire #Palisades #LosAngeles #California #SantaAna #SantaAnaWinds #Fire #BBCNews
item.description: The weather phenomena known as the Santa Ana winds has caused the wildfire to spread so rapidly through LA. #Wildfire #Palisades #LosAngeles #California #SantaAna #SantaAnaWinds #Fire #BBCNews

item.title: A body has been found in search for two British hikers who went missing in the Dolomites, Italy's alpine rescue service has said. Aziz Ziriat, 36, and Samuel Harris, 35, from London, were last heard from on 1 January. #Hikers #Britain #Dolomites #London #
item.description: A body has been found in search for two British hikers who went missing in the Dolomites, Italy's alpine rescue service has said. Aziz Ziriat, 36, and Samuel Harris, 35, from London, were last heard from on 1 January. #Hikers #Britain #Dolomites #London #

item.title: At least 30,000 people have been told to evacuate their homes and and 1,400 firefighters have been deployed to respond to the wildfires spreading in Los Angeles. #Wildfire #LA #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews
item.description: At least 30,000 people have been told to evacuate their homes and and 1,400 firefighters have been deployed to respond to the wildfires spreading in Los Angeles. #Wildfire #LA #LosAngeles #Palisades #PacificPalisade #US #Fire #News #BBCNews

item.title: Reform UK's Nigel Farage said on Sunday he thought Elon Musk was "a hero" but didn't agree with his views on everything. Hours later, Elon Musk said Farage "doesn't have what it takes" to lead his party. #PMQs #KeirStarmer #ElonMusk #NigelFarage #EdDavey
